scripts.start-aio: concurrently "npm run styles-dev" "npm run webpack-aio:watch" "npm run ts-dev-aio" "lite-server -w"
scripts.setup: npm install & npm link typescript & npm start
scripts.build-styles: npm run styles & npm run styles-prod
scripts.build-core-es5: npm run webpack-core-es5 & npm run webpack-core-es5-prod & npm run copy-styles-core-es5 & npm pack ./dist/output/core-es5 & npm run move-tgz
scripts.build-core-es5-lite: npm run webpack-core-es5 & npm run webpack-core-es5-prod & npm run copy-styles-core-es5 & npm pack ./dist/output/core-es5
scripts.build-components-es5: npm run webpack-components-es5 & npm run webpack-components-es5-prod & npm run copy-styles-components-es5 & npm pack ./dist/output/components-es5 & npm run move-tgz
scripts.build-components-es5-lite: npm run webpack-components-es5 & npm run webpack-components-es5-prod & npm run copy-styles-components-es5 & npm pack ./dist/output/components-es5
scripts.build-core: npm run webpack-core & npm run webpack-core-prod & npm run copy-styles-core & npm pack ./dist/output/core & npm run move-tgz
scripts.build-core-lite: npm run webpack-core & npm run webpack-core-prod & npm run copy-styles-core & npm pack ./dist/output/core
scripts.build-components: npm run webpack-components & npm run webpack-components-prod & npm run copy-styles-components & npm pack ./dist/output/components & npm run move-tgz
scripts.build-components-lite: npm run webpack-components & npm run webpack-components-prod & npm run copy-styles-components & npm pack ./dist/output/components
scripts.build-aio: npm run webpack-aio & npm run webpack-aio-prod & npm pack ./dist/output/aio & npm run move-tgz
scripts.build-aio-lite: npm run webpack-aio & npm run webpack-aio-prod & npm pack ./dist/output/aio
scripts.build-ajs: npm run webpack-ajs & npm run webpack-ajs-prod & npm pack ./dist/output/ajs & npm run move-tgz
scripts.build-ajs-lite: npm run webpack-ajs & npm run webpack-ajs-prod & npm pack ./dist/output/ajs
scripts.move-tgz: npm run copy-tgz & npm run del-tgz
scripts.build-all: npm run build-styles & npm run build-core-es5-lite & npm run build-components-es5-lite & npm run build-core-lite & npm run build-components-lite & npm run build-aio-lite & npm run build-ajs-lite & npm run move-tgz
scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist & npm run clean-documentation & npm run clean-build
scripts.reinstall-core: npm run uninstall-core & npm run install-core
